title: ‘We Make a Winning Plan Every Day:’ Coach Says Vingegaard Is Pulling Out All Stops to Be Ready for the Tour De France
content:
Danish rider still dealing with effects of dramatic crash in April, with nervousness also a factor.

Read the full article at ‘We Make a Winning Plan Every Day:’ Coach Says Vingegaard Is Pulling Out All Stops to Be Ready for the Tour De France on Velo.
author: sstokes
